data.name: Giraffe and Annika Art Book
data.detailed_description:
Giraffe & Annika Art Book


This is an art book containing illustrations from Giraffe & Annika, character settings, background settings, design materials, bonus illustrations, all Meowsterpieces from the game, unused settings, and more.
File format: PDF; full color 94p

How to View:

Right-click on "Giraffe and Annika" under "Manage" in the Library section of the Steam menu, then select "Browse Local Files". The files are contained in the "Giraffe and Annika Art Book" folder.

data.short_description: This ART BOOK contains illustrations of the indie game Giraffe and Annika, character settings, background settings, bonus illustrations, and all the cat pictures!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-6100 | AMD FX-8350
  • Memory: 403 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GTX 750 Ti | AMD
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
